Methods in gr.forth.ics.graph.algo that return Clusterer
static Clusterer Clusterers.connectedComponents(InspectableGraph g)
          Returns the connected components of a graph, using undirected semantics (without needing to wrap the graph in Graphs.undirected(InspectableGraph).
static Clusterer Clusterers.stronglyConnectedComponents(InspectableGraph g)
          Finds the strongly connected components of a graph, using Tarjan's algorithm.
